source_sentence: 正治二年(庚申)六月二十日書畢執筆信西於超昇寺東別所寫之點本奧記云。
translation: On the 20th day of the sixth month in the second year of Zhengzhi's reign, he wrote, executed, and kept to the west at Chaosheng Temple's east branch, a record of the original Ao says.
The original record of the Ao says.

source_sentence: 興福寺沙門齊順敬發願書寫一切大小乘經律論章疏等依其勸誘同寺覺詮寫了。
translation: "The monk at Kōfukuji, Qi Shunjing, made a vow to write all the sūtras, laws, treatises, commentaries, and so forth of the great and small vehicles based on his encouragement to fellow monks, Juequan, to write them down.

source_sentence: 于時久安四年歲次戊辰八月八日。
translation: It was on the eighth day of the eighth month of the fourth year of Jiu'an's reign.

source_sentence: 傳得大法師藏後雇誂同法勤慶奉移點了。
translation: After he received the treasury of the great Dharma teacher, he hired an entourage of fellow Dharma practitioners who diligently worked to transfer the texts.

source_sentence: 永萬二年春正月二十九日記。
translation: It was written on the twenty-ninth day of the first month of the second year of the Yongwan year.

source_sentence: 點本奧記云元興明詮天長八年略勘了。
translation: It was recorded on the 29th day of the first month of the second year of Eternal Life that the Dumbun Aoji said, "The eight years of Genshō Myōkan Tennō were roughly checked.

source_sentence: 九年三月二十六日講興福寺僧定寂以安和三年(歲次庚午)二月(己午)晦日尋借明詮僧都點本書(云云)。
translation: On the 26th day of the third month of the ninth year, the lecture at Xingfusi Sengyingji used the second day of the second month (Jiuji gwu) in the third year (Jiuji gwu) to borrow the text from Mingquan Sendu Diangshu (Yunyun).

source_sentence: 嘉應二年(庚寅)八月二十一日書寫了執筆沙門澄惠同九月二日寫裏書了。
translation: On the twenty-first day of the eighth month of the second year of Jiaying, the monk Chenghui, who was the copier, wrote the text on the second day of the ninth month.

source_sentence: 同年同月同日亥刻於燈下寫噵了。
translation: He wrote it under a lamp at the quarter past midnight on the same day of the same month of the same year.

source_sentence: 同九月十三日戌刻許於燈下寫點了。
translation: On the thirteenth day of the same month, at the quarter past the eleventh hour, he wrote under a lamp.

source_sentence: 同月二十一二三四都四ケ日之間加愚見比校之餘緣相交其功惟遲□裏噵點皆加校了其間專澡漱著法衣此書一卷三十八紙書寫及移點誂僧澄惠令終其功於比校者愚僧之功也以此善根敬報四恩愚僧遂出生死之游泥群生速登菩提之彼岸(而已)。
translation: Between the twenty-first, second, third, fourth, and fourth days of the same month, he added a stupid view of the other causes and conditions that intersected with his work, but he was slow to add a checkpoint inside the checkpoint. During that time, he devoted himself to washing and putting on his Dharma robes, writing this book of thirty-eight pages, transferring the checkpoint to the tempter Seng Chenghui, and causing him to finish his work at the checkpoint.
This was recorded by Śakra Kakuzen, a junior monk.

source_sentence: 正治二年夏六月之比語超昇寺沙門信西十郎房終寫功了(寫本永尊得業書也)。
translation: In the sixth month of the summer of the second year of Zhengzhi, the monk at Chaosheng Temple, Nobuishi Shilang's room, finally wrote a letter of completion (a letter of completion of the activities of Eisun).

source_sentence: 同年七月上旬三日移點書寫噵了(點噵本寶積院書也)抑當年者世間飢饉人力衰微也而分活命遂寫功勵微力移噵點志趣所之聊有二願當寺伽藍造功速成繼隆佛法惠命長遠(是一)往生內院面奉慈尊心不退轉發得菩提(是二)。
translation: In the first three days of the seventh month of the same year, he moved to the temple to write a detailed account of the events (a detailed account of the activities of the temple's original jeweled palace), despite the fact that the world was starving and its human resources were declining, and he had a share of living beings, so he wrote a letter of encouragement for his modest efforts to move to the temple.
